version_description: We’ve made a few improvements including squashing a bug with banners, and fixing the home screen cards on the iPhone so they’re not too big. Happy new year!
We’ve improved Shopping Lists so they sync quicker than ever.

Changed your number? Or your name? You can now update your contact details from within the app.

We’ve been working around the clock to fix a bug that made the app behave strangely if the phone wasn’t set to the correct time. (Working around the clock! ‘Around’ the ‘clock’, get it?)
Lots of fine-tuning, bug fixing, and under-the-hood improvements in this update.
Lots of under-the-hood improvements in this update. We’ve fixed a couple of bugs with orders and slot booking so the app should run smoother than ever.

We’ve squashed a few bugs and spruced up the app – we hope you like it!
Note: some users have experienced issues with the app failing to launch. If this affects you, please restart your device.
We’ve improved the trolley and product info pages. Happy shopping!
We’ve squashed some bugs and improved the app so it should run smoother than ever. Enjoy!
Some under-the-hood improvements to make the app run more smoothly. Happy shopping!
We’ve done a bit of behind-the-scenes fine-tuning, and spruced up a few pages, too. Enjoy!
We've fixed an issue where the app would not load properly for a small number of users.
We’ve squashed a few bugs and improved the slot booking page. Happy shopping!
Fixed a bug where the total trolley value would sometimes not update correctly.
We’ve fixed a bug where the search bar sometimes wasn’t working properly on the iPad app.
We’ve improved order notifications and squashed a few small bugs. Happy shopping!
We’ve squashed some bugs and made some behind-the-scenes tweaks. Enjoy!
We've fixed an issue that was causing the app to crash for some users.
We’ve squashed a bug that was affecting customers using the iPad 2.

It’s the most wonderful update of the year! ’Tis the last one of 2016; we’ve squashed a bug that was affecting customers using the iPad 2, and spruced up the app so it runs smoother than Santa’s sleigh. Merry Christmas!
Happy 2017! We’ve improved the app by squashing a few bugs and improving Shopping Lists. Enjoy!
Happy 2017! We’ve improved the app by squashing a few bugs and improving Shopping Lists. Enjoy!
We’ve made our messages clearer throughout the app, and squashed a few pesky bugs, too. Happy shopping!

It’s been a busy week! Not only has Ocado HQ moved to bigger and better offices, but we’ve improved the search speed in the app, made lots of design improvements, and squashed a few bugs, too.
Plus, we’re rolling out more and more features; keep an eye out for Apple Pay, and a few other top secret additions coming in the near future. Happy shopping!
We found a bug that was making the app crash when some shoppers used One-Click. This is fixed now – One-Click away!
We’ve squashed a bug that could make the app crash when removing products from the trolley.
A magnifying glass inspired this update: we’ve improved the app’s search accuracy, and zapped a few small bugs, too.
We’ve made some under-the-hood tweaks to the app so it should run even smoother than before. Happy shopping!
We've fixed a crash when viewing the orders page with VoiceOver enabled.
We’ve added better nutritional info on product pages, improved searching, and squashed a few bugs along the way. Enjoy!
We’ve added better nutritional info on product pages, improved searching, and squashed a few bugs along the way. Enjoy!

Order! Order! (Details! Details!) We've improved the order details page so it’s even easier to find info about your shopping. We've squashed a few bugs too, and spruced up the app so it should run faster than ever. Enjoy!

Order! Order! (Details! Details!) We've improved the order details page so it’s even easier to find info about your shopping. We've squashed a few bugs too, and spruced up the app so it should run faster than ever. Enjoy!

Order! Order! (Details! Details!) We've improved the order details page so it’s even easier to find info about your shopping. We've squashed a few bugs too, and spruced up the app so it should run faster than ever. Enjoy!
We've squashed some bugs and made some under-the-hood improvements to the app. Happy shopping!
We fixed a bug from the previous version that caused the app to crash sometimes.
We have squashed some bugs and made some under-the-hood improvements to the app. Happy shopping!
We've squashed a bug that was disabling the One-Click button. This should work fine now – OneClick away!
We’ve squashed a few bugs so the app should work smoother than ever. Happy shopping!
We've fixed a few under-the-bonnet bugs to keep everything running smoothly.
We’re ready! We’ve updated the app for iOS 11 and the iPhone X. Happy shopping.
We’ve fixed a bug that was affecting search on the iPad app, so it shouldn’t crash any more.
A bit of spring cleaning in this update: we’ve squashed some bugs and spruced up the app, so it should run smoother than ever.
We’ve squashed a bug that was affecting customers editing orders on the iPhone app.
We’ve squashed a few bugs so the app should work smoother than ever. Happy shopping!
We’ve squashed a few bugs so the app should work smoother than ever. Happy shopping!
We’ve squashed a few bugs so the app should work smoother than ever. Happy shopping!
We’ve improved the order details page – you’ll now see the products in your delivery listed by use-by date, and you can download a pdf of your receipt. Enjoy!
A bit of spring cleaning in this update: we’ve squashed some bugs and spruced up the app, so it should run smoother than ever.
A bit of spring cleaning in this update: we’ve squashed some bugs and spruced up the app, so it should run smoother than ever.
We’ve squashed a few bugs so the app should work smoother than ever. Happy shopping!
We’ve squished a bug that prevented some customers from using their keyboard to type passwords. We’ve also improved Meals and Lists so you can create even longer shopping lists.
We've squashed a few bugs so the app should work smoother than ever. Happy shopping!
We’ve squashed a few bugs so the app should work smoother than ever. Happy shopping!

We’ve changed the Catalogue so that it syncs with the website and shows you the latest product information. Favourites has been improved and is now smarter than ever. We’ve also fixed some bugs and made a few technical tweaks so the app should be as smooth as melted chocolate.

We’ve squashed a few bugs so the app should work smoother than ever. Happy shopping!
Great news – we’ve removed the bugs that were causing issues with your Address Book and reserving delivery slots.
We’ve added support for iOS 12 and – drumroll please – you can now ask Siri when your delivery is due.
We've squashed a few bugs so the app should work smoother​ than ever. Happy shopping!
We've squashed a few bugs so the app should work smoother than ever. Happy shopping!
We’ve squashed a few bugs so the app should work smoother than ever. Happy shopping!
We’ve exterminated a few bugs so your Favourites list and certain voucher screens all works properly again. Happy shopping!
We’ve made a few security tweaks to the app for an even better experience. Happy shopping!

We’ve rolled out a few behind-the-scenes technical improvements and made tweaks to refunds so that the most up-to-date information is used.  We’re dropping support for iOS9 in this version so please ensure you’re all up to date.

We’ve heard you and fixed how Favourites display – they’re back to being sorted by category. We’ve also made a few behind-the-scenes improvements for an even better shopping experience.

Due to continued high demand, we had to take our app offline in March. We’ve been working hard to get this up and running again.

We’re initially rolling this out to a small number of customers to make sure we’re offering the best possible app experience. We’ll release it to more customers as soon as we can and will notify you when you’re able to use the app once again. In the meantime, please use ocado.com (which also works on your mobile browser).
